Troy Montes-Michie (amụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, onye na-ese onyinyo, onye na'ese ihe, na ónyé na-akpụ ihe na New York City. Ọrụ Michie na-ejikarị mkparịta ụka na canon nke collage; yana, nyocha nghọta ọha mmadụ banyéré agbụrụ, okike, mmekọahụ, na mpaghara ndị ọzọ nke njirimara na ike.
A mụrụ Troy Michie na El Paso, TX
Ọ natara BFA site nà Mahadum Texas na El Paso na 2009 nà MFA site na Yale School of Art na Painting / Printmaking nà 2011.
Michie sonyere nà Tuesday Night MFA Lecture Series nà BU School of Visual Arts.
